byline.contributor: Somini Sengupta contributed reporting from the United Nations.

abstract: Pres-elect Donald Trump's transition team sends memos to State Dept and United States Agency for International Development requesting details about all existing jobs, programs and activities related to promoting gender equality.

headline.print_headline: Transition Team’s Questions on Gender Equality Raise Concerns at State Dept.
headline.main: Transition Team’s Request on Gender Equality Rattles State Dept.

keywords.value: United States Agency for International Development
keywords.name: organizations

snippet: The Trump team’s request made employees at the agency wonder if the incoming administration was planning to roll back changes first made by Hillary Clinton....
lead_paragraph: The Trump team’s request made employees at the agency wonder if the incoming administration was planning to roll back changes first made by Hillary Clinton.
